Uses of Interface
com.interface21.context.ApplicationListener

Packages that use ApplicationListener
com.interface21.context This package builds on the beans package to add support for message sources and for the Observer design pattern, and the ability for application objects to obtain resources using a consistent API.  
com.interface21.context.support Classes supporting the com.interface21.context package, such as abstract base classes for ApplicationContext implementations and a MessageSource implementation. 
com.interface21.web.context.support Classes supporting the com.interface21.web.context package, such as WebApplicationContext implementations, and a utility class for retrieval of the root application context etc. 
 

Uses of ApplicationListener in com.interface21.context
 

Subinterfaces of ApplicationListener in com.interface21.context
 interface ApplicationEventMulticaster
          Subinterface of ApplicationListener to be implemented by listeners that can broadcast events to other listeners.
 

Methods in com.interface21.context with parameters of type ApplicationListener
 void ApplicationEventMulticaster.addApplicationListener(ApplicationListener listener)
          Add a listener to be notified of all events
 void ApplicationEventMulticaster.removeApplicationListener(ApplicationListener listener)
          Remove a listener in the notification list]
 

Uses of ApplicationListener in com.interface21.context.support
 

Classes in com.interface21.context.support that implement ApplicationListener
 class ApplicationEventMulticasterImpl
          Concrete implementation of ApplicationEventMulticaster Doesn't permit multiple instances of the same listener.
 class ConsoleListener
          Simple listener for debug use only that logs messages to the console.
